  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_82673</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_82673</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer by radiation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung durch Strahlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert thermique par rayonnement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de calor pela radiação</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio di calore tramite radiazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μεταφορά θερμότητας από την ακτινοβολία</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Traspaso térmico por la radiación</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that fire transfers thermal energy by radiation, which doesn't need a substance to travel through empty space.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">empty space</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Heat transfer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thermal energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Feuer thermische 
Energie durch Strahlung überträgt, die nicht eine Substanz 
benötigt, durch leeren Platz zu reisen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que le feu transfère 
l'énergie thermique par le rayonnement, qui ne a pas besoin d'une 
substance pour voyager par l'espace vide.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que o fogo transfere a 
energia térmica pela radiação, que não necessita uma substância 
viajar através do espaço vazio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che il fuoco 
trasferisce l'energia termica tramite radiazione, che non ha bisogno 
di una sostanza di attraversare through spazio vuoto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι η πυρκαγιά μεταφέρει 
τη θερμική ενέργεια από την ακτινοβολία, η οποία δεν χρειάζεται 
μια ουσία για να ταξιδεψει μέσω του κενού διαστήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que el fuego transfiere
energía termal por la radiación, que no necesita una sustancia 
viajar a través de espacio vacío.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">leerer Platz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feuer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeübertragung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">thermische Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'espace vide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le feu</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transfert thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">énergie thermique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">espaço vazio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">fogo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transferência de calor</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scambio di calore</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">energia termica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
